page.title: 16RECREATION IN MOUNTAIN ASH
page.content:
Mountain Ash unfortunately has limited facilities,and unlike the other two major towns in the Cynon Valley, it has no sports centre.
It does however have Gwernifor Park opened in 1937.This has tennis courts, a bowling green and pavillion,a children's play park and a small out door swimming pool.
There is also the Recreation ground in Woodland Street owned by Mid Glamorgan Education Authority which is used by local schools.Mountain Ash Rugby Club also use it for their home games.
In 1957 a new field was laid near Mountain Ash Comprehensive called Caedrawnant,and this accomodates football,cricket and tennis.
